2.1.3.1.2. d1client.DataONEClient¶

class d1client.DataONEClient(cnBaseUrl='https://cn.dataone.org/cn', credentials=None)¶
__init__(cnBaseUrl='https://cn.dataone.org/cn', credentials=None)¶

DataONEClient, which uses CN- and MN clients to perform high level operations against the DataONE infrastructure.
